name: Sheriffs of the Musical Scroll
description: Surviving their encounter with the Many-Eyed One, the Sheriffs of the Musical Scroll are known far and wide for their affinity with all manner of woodwind. Now, after unfurling a cursed scroll and discovering secrets few others in Kharth know, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
